name: Spot Health
headline: At-home diagnostics as a service
description: Spot is building the infrastructure to support the future of at-home diagnostics. Our fully white-labeled platform helps brands offer lab-analyzed diagnostic tests using at-home collection kits. Companies simply order tests via our API, and we handle the rest—the collection kits, the logistics, physician authorization, and the lab integrations.
generated_description:
Spot Health is at the forefront of revolutionizing the healthcare landscape, specifically through at-home diagnostics. Founded in 2021 and a participant in Y Combinator Batch W22, this Cincinnati-based startup is built around a straightforward yet powerful mission: providing diagnostics as a service directly to consumers, enabling them to take control of their health from the comfort of their homes.

Their white-labeled platform allows brands to offer comprehensive lab-analyzed diagnostic tests, covering blood, urine, and saliva samples collected at home. This approach not only makes healthcare more accessible but also eliminates the hassle of in-person lab visits. By simply integrating Spot Health’s API, companies can order collection kits and rely on Spot to manage everything—from the logistics to obtaining physician approvals and laboratory partnerships. 

With a compact team of nine passionate employees, Spot Health aims to streamline the testing process and enhance user experience. Their service is HIPAA compliant, guaranteeing user privacy while ensuring efficient handling of test kits and results. The ultimate goal? To help brands launch their testing operations quickly— days rather than months—while offering robust, personalized health solutions.

Spot Health is positioned at the intersection of telehealth and diagnostics, tapping into a growing market of consumers seeking convenient, reliable health data at home. With a focus on personalization and patient empowerment, they are reshaping how we think about diagnostic testing and care.

If you’re intrigued about how Spot Health could elevate your brand’s health offerings, head over to their website [Spot Health](https://spotdx.com), where you can explore their services further or even book a call. With Spot Health, the future of diagnostics is not just envisioned; it’s being actively created.
